Author: tentaclebarn
Text: I would also recommend going for a walk if you can, those always help settle things down for me. Itâ€™s better to eat and exercise I think than to just restrict.

Author: Lunar_Heart
Text: Using laxatives does *not* actually prevent the absorption or calories. Anything you see after taking them that looks like weight loss is entirely resultant of dehydration. It won't spare you any weight gain, but it *will* seriously fuck you up. Honestly in this situation, restricting is the kinder thing to do to yourself. Using lax is pointless and more acutely dangerous than starving (though obviously starving is still very risky).
